messages.subject: Re: Ninja gone?
messages.msgSnippet: ... What do you mean? That the genuine Ninja Dojo and Training Camp is a fraud? Where will all of our wannabe ninjas go for study ;) Jim
messages.messageBody:
> From: golfmandan@...
>
>The problem with #4 is first that ninja didn't wear black pajamas, and second, the Meiji court couldn't have summoned them for the mission, b/c ninjas hadn't even really been around for 200 years. Other than that, there wasn't much of a problem. (chuckles).
>
>
What do you mean? That the genuine Ninja Dojo and Training Camp is a
fraud? Where will all of our wannabe ninjas go for study ;)

Jim
